item.title: My Journey Learning About Juniper Junos
item.description: Introduction Hello and thank you for checking out another blog post. Iâ€™ve been under the weather for a bit but I am back on the keys. This post will be all about some neat things I discovered while learning a bit about the Juniper Junos NOS (network operating system). Previously I had never used Juniper, it was a vendor that always eluded me. My previous employers did not utilize this NOS and I never got around to adding it in the lab.
